availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, farmer. Harlan County, Kentucky, native. Son of Carr Britton and Jane Ball Britton. Married to Maryan Lewis Britton. Father of Mariah Britton, Samuel Britton, Elizabeth Britton, Louisa Britton, William Britton, James Britton, Sarah A Britton, Ibby Britton, Victoria Britton, Carlo Britton, Martha Britton, Van Britton, and Mary Britton. Farmer in Clay County in 1850. Farmer in Clay County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Kentucky District, p. 121A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, p. 21.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Precinct 4, p. 200A.
Clay County Genealogical and Historical Society, Clay County, Kentucky: History and Families (Paducah, KY: Turner Publishing Company), p. 201.
